Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is at the top of the CONMEBOL qualifying standings, while Chile is in eighth place with just one win in six games.
Argentina has a 100% record in all competitions in 2024 and in their previous World Cup qualifying match, they registered a 1-0 away win over Brazil.
Chile was eliminated from the group stage of the Copa America, failing to score in three games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The two teams have a long-standing rivalry and have met 95 times in all competitions since 1910.
The Copa America 2024 winners are unbeaten in their last seven meetings against La Roja, recording four wins.
Others: La Albiceleste have lost just one of their last 27 games in the World Cup qualifiers.
The two teams have met 17 times in the World Cup qualifiers and Argentina has the upper hand in these meetings, recording 12 wins while suffering just one loss.
